title: File a Complaint with the Court
description: A paralegal needs to electronically file a new complaint with a federal court.

tasks.description: Convert the final complaint document to a text-searchable PDF.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a compliant PDF file.

tasks.description: Log in to the court's CM/ECF (Case Management/Electronic Case Files) system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully accesses the e-filing portal.

tasks.description: Initiate a new civil case, enter all party information, and upload the complaint PDF.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly enters all data and uploads the document.

tasks.description: Pay the filing fee and save the receipt and notice of electronic filing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The complaint is successfully filed, and a new case is opened.
